archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1544
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Federated customer (Head office with many Franchisees/end users) I need to receive a varying (recalculated) monthly Head Office rebate based on my Whole of Business revenue to Vodafone

properties.value: How should it be supported in Comarch? How cooperation with Franchisees looks like, what can be negotiated? When rebate should be calculated, what are the rules? Hierarchy excamples and rebates will be provided

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
